short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rename downloaded files with more readable names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I did this project for the people of the GIU

No more mess,
No more scattered downloads,
No more manual renaming

Now you can know with ease what file you just downloaded.
